title: Maybelline New York Hyper Easy Liquid Pen No-Skip Eyeliner, Satin Finish, Waterproof Formula, Eye Liner Makeup, Pitch Black, 0.018 Fl; Oz
description: Introducing the liquid liner minus the skips, slips, gaps and struggle. Liquid liner goes hyper easy. With its hyper easy brush tip, It delivers the smoothest glide, fitting to the shape of your eye. The revolutionary flex tip brush and custom hexagonal grip gives optimal control and easy, stable application. Available in Pitch Black, it lasts up to 24 hours with in10se color that doesn't smudge. Ophthalmologist tested and suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lenses.
